Text:
Respect to the uploader, dual channel!
NOT poxy joint stereo!

That's the way to do it!

That's weird, the partially download track was reported as Dual Channel in Winamp, but the fully downloaded tracks are Stereo.
No probs there, well better than JOINT stereo (which is CRAP).
All tracks about 1.2 - 2.9 dB below zero, try running them through MP3Trim to normalise.

Great quality, thanks, pity they are a bunch of shirt lifters though.............

Love all your albums there best have i found on here and i allways come to you when i download.

Was wondering if maybe you could do the Now Thats What I Call Music Collection that would be awsome as the ones i have found arnt that great quality

Many thanks for all your hard work really appricate it :-)

g8aso - can you post a few links to this information and i will have a read and a download. I am a person who just enjoys the music, but i would not have a perfect ear for music. But you have to admit they aways looked as they were having fun in the songs and music videos.

Joe

Tauntonlad - thanks for your comments.

Funny you should ask about the Now Thats What I Call Music Collection. I have been visiting my local charity shops and i have been steadily picking them up for about ?1.00 each, I have the following
Now 1990 - 18 - 34 - 35 - 38 - 39 - 42 - 44 - 46 - 47 - 49 - 50 - 51 - 53 - 56 - 59 - 60 - 61 - 65 - 68 - 69 - 70 - 71 - 72
They have been ripped and scanned, but i would like to add more before i would upload.
I also have the following but a disc is missing
33 - 54 - 57

So i will see how it goes over the next couple of weeks. 

Thanks for the interest.

Joe
